blog.name: snowe-zolynn-rogers
blog.title: Random
blog.description: Sunny, 20, any pronouns (though I prefer she/her and they/them), aspiring author, and professional chaotic ADHD disaster. I post incorrect quotes, text post memes, imagines, headcanons, my writing, AUs, aesthetics/moodboards, and occasional shitposts and some memes too. The ask box is always open so feel free to ask about any AUs/headcanons, send in incorrect quotes you'd like to see, aesthetics or moodboards you'd like me to (try to) make, or just to spam or scream at me. Let me know if you want to be tagged for certain posts or if I should tag something.

summary: Dabi, tired: I want to die. Chisaki, bored: Same. Shigaraki, annoyed: KILL ME! Kurogiri, tired of their self-deprication: Please...

summary:
aizawa: hey toshinori can you do me a favor?
toshinori: what?
aizawa: can you please do me a quick favor?
toshinori: sorry i...
body:
aizawa: hey toshinori can you do me a favor?
toshinori: what?
aizawa: can you please do me a quick favor?
toshinori: sorry i can't hear you, i don't have my glasses on
aizawa: ...istg i am this close to-

summary: How the members of Class 1A come out
body:
How the members of Class 1A come out

(According to my headcanons on their sexuality, you’re free to disagree if you want)

  • Aoyama: wears increasingly intricate clothes and makeup with the genderfluid flag as the colour scheme waiting for someone to ask him about it
  • Ashido: straight up posts a picture of herself making out with a pan on Snapchat
  • Asui: “Look I’m trying to think straight here which is ironic cause I’m a trans lesbian”
  • Iida: writes a nine page essay arguing that Hamlet and Horatio are gay for each other. It’s so beautiful it’s now framed on the common room wall
  • Uraraka: she shared her tumblr account with her friends and her username is “bisexual-space-witch”
  • Ojirou: does a report on why several animals exhibit lgbt+ traits (insert post about gay lion pride here) but gets a mark taken off cause his conclusion is just “same”
  • Kaminari: has a low key existential crisis because “what would happen to me during the hunger games? It’s one boy and girl but I’m both! Would my name go in both draws? Or neither?! What would happen?!?!?”
  • Kirishima: during truth or dare reveals that one of the reasons that he loves Red Riot is because he was Kirishima’s first crush and made him realize he’s gay
  • Kouda: didn’t want to participate in the sex-ed talk in class hosted by Midnight and argued “I’m ace/aro so its not like I need it”
  • Satou: bakes a cake layered with demisexual colours for the class (also bakes pride cakes for the others when they ask for it and they all love and appreciate him for it)
  • Shouji: keeps saying “mood” during cards on game night whenever anyone plays an ace until the others threaten to kick him out
  • Jirou: 9 million posters of Hayley in her room and constantly blasts Girls/Girls/Boys. That’s it. No one’s really suprised
  • Sero: drunkenly flirts with all of the boys and girls in class after a large party and keeps trying to cuddle with Aoyama, Ashido, Kaminari and Shouji until he eventually passes out
  • Tokoyami: writes a really needlessly edgy poem for English that is a subtle (really not subtle) description of being agender
  • Todoroki: constantly is found hiding in the dorm’s supply closet and always makes the same “coming out of the closet” joke whenever someone comes to get him (he still finds in funny even after doing it 672529 times)
  • Hagakure: “Tooru come out” “I’m pansexual” “I meant of the dorm but I support you”
  • Bakugou: when a reporter rudely comments about him never getting a girlfriend with the way he behaves he says “well it’s good thing I’m gay then fuckface”
  • Midoriya: breaks his arms again (sigh) and gets one cast in the pansexual flag colours and the other in the trans colours
  • Shinsou: his cats are named after Drag Queens he likes. He also has an agenda that he straight up labeled “the gay agenda” just for laughs
  • Yaoyorozu: someone asks her if she’s dating Endeavor’s son and she just laughs in their face and responds “me and Todoroki are the two biggest disaster gays I’ve ever met. Are you serious?”

blog.name: aishiteru-bnha
blog.title: Heros and Scenarios
blog.description: Heya! I'm Emi, and I'll be writing headcanons/scenarios/etc/ for My Hero Academia! Please read the rules before requesting!

title: Introduction
body:
Hello! It’s a pleasure to meet you, I’m Emi! I’m a new My Hero Academia headcanon blog!

I write for X Reader/ S/O requests, sometimes do fantasies, and special events on certain days. I’ll go ahead list some rules you need to know!

  • I do not write NSFW at all! I’m under 18 and I don’t want to risk anything with Tumblr
  • 5 characters per headcanons/scenarios!
  • nly up-to-date on anime, barely what happened with manga
  • Pairing requests will happen on special occasions!
  • PLEASE SAY WHICH CHARACTER(S) YOU WANT

Other than that, feel free to request things!

blog.name: vex-weirdnobody

blog.description: I am a Weird Nobody with a weird life

title: All for One Theory
body: Ok so this is more of a headcannon then a theory but what if All for One was the Baby that was born with the first quirk. I say this because it would make since the one quirk that has the power to give and take away quirks the start of all quirks. It was just a random thought
